channel.title: Emily Darrow's Portfolio
channel.description: All the coolest stuff I've ever done.

item.title: Creating the Jekyll
item.description:
Today I created this Jekyll site. It’s pretty awesome. I’m still learning all of the details of how it works, but I can fortunately modify and edit it via github, so I can in fact manage the site from anywhere.

I’m wondering if I can use jadelang to create these files. Markdown obviously works (this page) and Jekyll claims it can handle all sorts of things, but we’ll find out I suppose.
